project.title: Indiana Dunes National Park Pollinator Trail
project.problem: Indiana Dunes has received a grant to install interactive displays along an existing trail which would educate visitors about bees and other pollinators. Displays should be kid-friendly and ADA compliant.
project.solution: Displays are proposed for each area based on their location and the amount of content for each. Ideas are illustrated and presented to Indiana Dunes. This is an ongoing project, scheduled to be completed in May of 2022.
